name: AIRCRAFT MECHANICS FRATERNAL ASSOCIATION
description: Aircraft Mechanics Fraternal Association is a craft specific, independent aviation union.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor and evaluate the congressional agenda and administration proposals impacting the aviation industry, including reauthorization of the Federal Aviation Administration.
